update product
Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CodeNo = #{codeno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

BrandId = #{brandid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ClassificationId = #{classificationid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

ProductDetailPath = #{productdetailpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ProductDetailMobilePath = #{productdetailmobilepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OnSale = #{onsale,jdbcType=BIT},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
